Nokia Extensions for JSR-257
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.nokia.nfc.nxp.mfstd

Interface Summary
MFApplication Class that provides access to a Mifare Standard Card's application.
MFApplicationDirectory Provides access to Mifare Standard Card's application directory (MAD).
MFBlock Base interface for handling Mifare Standard card blocks.
MFDataArea Provides simple read/write functionality to data area(s) of Mifare card.
MFManufacturerBlock A class representing a Mifare Standard manufacturer block.
MFSector Provides access to sectors within Mifare Standard Cards.
MFSectorTrailer Provides access to a sector trailer.
MFStandardConnection The interface representing the connection to a Mifare Standard 1k or 4k card.
 

Class Summary
MFAccessBits A class for handling Mifare Standard card's access bits.
MFKey A class representing a Mifare Standard Card authentication key.
MFKey.KeyA A class representing a Mifare Standard Card authentication key type A.
MFKey.KeyB A class representing a Mifare Standard Card authentication key type B.
MFTrailerContents Describes the contents of a sector trailer, including authentication keys and access bits.
MFValue A class representing the contents of a Mifare Standard Card's value block.
 

Exception Summary
MFStandardException Thrown to indicate an error specific to the Mifare Standard Card communication, i.e. if authentication fails or if the methods conditions are not met.
